mapper.sql: SELECT t1.*, ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_XL' AND t2.`num_value`=t1.`education` ) education_str , ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_QYZT' AND t2.`code`=t1.`use_status` ) use_status_str, ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_XB' AND t2.num_value =t1.`sex` ) sex_str, ( SELECT t2.`unit_name` FROM sys_unit t2 WHERE t2.unit_id =t1.`belong_unit` ) belong_unit_str , ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_ZWJB' AND t2.num_value =t1.`title` ) title_str , ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_XXMJ' AND t2.num_value =t1.`secret_level` ) secret_level_str , ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_ZJFZ' AND t2.num_value =t1.`group_type` ) group_type_str FROM zjk_base t1
